body_html:
Sorry for not seeing things. Now aware and paying attention.

@taion - do you see a solution that results in two properties:
(a) Users out-of-the-box see info warnings if they configure:
`tf.logging.set_verbosity(tf.logging.INFO)

and
(b) We don't get this duplicate behavior if the user manually imports logging? (@mrry, I didn't actually write all the code in question, I was just the last fool to touch it when trying to fix an earlier manifestation of this same problem. :)

body:
Sorry for not seeing things.  Now aware and paying attention.

@taion - do you see a solution that results in two properties:
 (a)  Users out-of-the-box see info warnings if they configure:
  `tf.logging.set_verbosity(tf.logging.INFO)

and
(b)  We don't get this duplicate behavior if the user manually imports logging?  (@mrry, I didn't actually write all the code in question, I was just the last fool to touch it when trying to fix an earlier manifestation of this same problem. :)
